name: Urban
description:
Urban was founded in 2014 by Jack and Giles who had a simple mission: to provide easy and affordable access to wellness, so people can live happier and healthier every day.

Since then, we've delivered well over 300,000 massage therapy treatments in London, Paris, Manchester and Birmingham. We empower wellness practitioners by providing them with a marketplace to meet local customers, business software to manage their work and a community to belong to. 

In late 2018, we expanded beyond massage to form three business divisions: mind/body, beauty and fitness. Our growing range of services includes massage, facial, nail and osteopath treatments performed at times and places chosen by our clients.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Jack Tang
team.bioHtml: Founder @urban-massage, @thestudentjob.com • Worked at @Evenbase, @Jobsite.co.uk

team.title: CTO
team.name: Giles Williams
team.bioHtml: CTO @ Urban Massage, Acqui-hired into @Jobsite.co.uk and @Evenbase from @thestudentjob.com. Background in agile mobile/server/web & sysad. Loving NodeJS.

team.title: Customer Service Representative
team.name: Ana Martins
team.bioHtml: Worked at Whole Foods Market, Nike. Experience with Communication Skills, Customer Service, English language. Went to University Of Roehampton

jobs.title: Beauty Therapist assessor
jobs.description:
Who we are;

Urban Massage is a UK based start-up that is looking to fundamentally change the wellness industry. We are the largest provider of at-home, on-demand massage in the UK and France, using tech to connect >1,500 qualified therapists across London, Birmingham, Manchester, and Paris with clients in need of a massage. In the coming years, we aim to democratise wellness globally, using smart technology to reshape how people access fitness, beauty and medical products and services.


The Role and Who we need;

With our growth aspirations (which we are starting to act on now) this means we need someone to assess potential beauty practitioners, to see if they meet the criteria to partner with the platform. Potential partners come in to our office and are assessed through our quality framework, and this is where you will come in.

Through your assessment you will determine whether they meet the standard criteria we need to be a partner on our platform or not – so we need you to be attentive, understand what you are doing, and able to communicate well.

If you can assess beauty – get in touch.

Requirements

*
** NVQ Level 3 as a minimum
** At least 2-3 years’ experience as a beauty therapist and performing nails and facials
** Ability to multitask, be attentive and understand a quality criteria framework
** Good people and communication skills (you will be dealing with lots of people)
** Adaptable and flexible


Nice to have:

* Teaching/assessment background

Benefits

Take part of a growing community, you will be meeting a lot of professionals and will create amazing connections within the field. This is a great opportunity to develop your skills as assessor, you will be provided with a free training, support and follow-up. Paid £16/hour.

jobs.title: Customer Service Representative
jobs.description:
ABOUT URBAN MASSAGE

We don’t do ordinary. If we did, we wouldn’t be shaking up a billion-dollar industry with smart tech, out-of-the-box ideas, and a big belief that self-care should be high on everyone’s priorities.

If you don’t do ordinary either, you should probably keep reading.

We’re Urban Massage, and we believe in enabling others to build better wellness habits. Whether that’s giving someone the chance to book a much-needed massage to calm and centre their overworked brain, or helping to rehabilitate someone back to better health with a Sports massage treatment, we’re there to make it easy, affordable and professional.

Like any great company, we’re nothing without our people. From the teams that build our top-notch tech, to the marketers who help spread our message far and wide, we’re built on the skills, knowledge and attitude of our employees.


ABOUT THE ROLE

And that’s where you come in.

We’re after an exceptional, people-minded person to keep our customer service experience at the top of its game. Without our customers and therapists, we’re nothing, which is why your role is so important. You’ll be the first point of call and responsible for ensuring that people fall in love with Urban Massage from ‘Hey! How can I help?’

As a Customer Service Representative, you’ll support both our Heroes (massage therapists) and our incredible clients in their journey. We’ll need you to build strong relationships, continuously obtain feedback and be the voice of the customer as we grow. You’ll be an essential part of our warm, smart and energetic team.

Oh, yeah - the team.

We’re a big, friendly bunch. We’ve got members from all corners of the globe, with a variety of experience, bags of energy and a big belief in wellness at work. That’s why our culture is second-to-none. From social gatherings, work retreats, workout classes, cold-pressed juice, trips to the pub, ping pong tables and zen rooms, to dedicated support to help you grow in your role - being a part of Urban Massage is something special.

Interested? We can’t wait to hear from you.


June Start.


RESPONSIBILITIES

* Proactively liaising with therapists partners / customers to ensure bookings run smoothly
* Investigate and resolve corporate customer queries and issues
* Supporting the Customer Service function for the other customer bases
* Answering the phone, emails, and live chat from Customers / Therapists / Partners
* Providing feedback to relevant departments to help improve our customer experience
* Work a shift pattern; 5 8-hour shifts a week, operating between 7am and 10pm, with 2 weekends worked a month

Requirements

* Fluency in English
* Evidence of the cultural behaviours we associate with brilliant performance here
* Driven and motivated by relationships and communicating with people
* Problem solving at a fast pace, whilst ensuring great service
* Strong spoken and written language skills
* Comfortable working with others and able to nurture a brilliant team environment
* A calm and friendly telephone manner
* A great multi-tasker able to manage lots of different things at the same time

Benefits


* £21,000
* Plenty of opportunities to learn and grow within our business
* Join a fast-growing and exciting start-up
* Competitive salary (based on experience)
* Free weekly yoga/fitness sessions
* Discounts on at-home massages
* Central London office with great transport links
* Annual company retreat
* Our new amazing Urban HQ with a Ping-Pong Table, Zen room, Juices and Fresh Fruit, breakfasts and more.
* Working with a fun and highly-motivated team. Never a dull moment for sure!

jobs.title: Marketing Manager Paris
jobs.description:
Urban is an on-demand wellness company, that currently offers massage and osteopathy at home in London and Paris. Over the next few months, we are also launching skincare and fitness services.

This is an full time role in the Paris office, focusing on a diverse range of initiatives to understand what influences user behaviour and demand growth at Urban. The ideal person will accelerate our growth in Paris through driving awareness of our multiple categories to our target market.


Responsibilities

* Spread the word! Increase our awareness and consideration levels in Paris.
* Acquire new users.
* Get to know our user base, their demographics and their characteristic, and what influences their buying behaviour.
* Understand the wider market trends within the verticals in which we operate.
* Support the Global Marketing team by providing insights to improve marketing performance in Paris.
* Engage possible partnerships to drive revenues in Paris.
* Responsible for PR in Paris.
* Responsible for organising and driving offline activities in Paris.
* Work with central team to optimise digital ads in Paris.

Requirements


* At least one year of work experience in a marketing field, and two years of work experience in all fields.
* Incredibly creative at coming up with good ideas to tell our story.
* Pro-active - this is a role which require the motivation to drive your own day-to-day activities.
* A collaborator who will happily support the rest of the French operation from time-to-time for the good of the business.
* Passionate about building young businesses.
* Hands-on - we are looking for someone who can set the tactics and execute. You will have one intern reporting into you.
* Great communicator and strong articulation skills.
* Confident grasp of English and French Language.
* Masters Degree

Benefits


* Evolution in a fast growing startup with excellent career opportunities
* Opportunity to work with international and highly motivated team!
* A constant learning with a lot of feedback and the opportunity to receive great responsibilities and have a real impact on the success of our startup
* Apple equipment
* Discounts on home massages

jobs.title: Multilingual Customer Representative - French and German speaking
jobs.description:
Please note that this role is for someone that can speak English, French and German to support our growing international business from London. Applicants that do not meet this requirement will sadly not be considered for this role.

ABOUT URBAN MASSAGE

Our purpose is to connect people with high quality health and well-being professionals for convenient treatments that meet their needs, wherever and whenever they want them. We make this possible by our slick technology platforms (apps and website) and brilliant people. Since our start-up formed in 2014 we've grown significantly and now make over 7,000 bookings a month possible with exciting plans to grow. As a place to work, we provide those who share our passion with big roles with huge scope to impact our success, the freedom to apply their talent and ideas however they see appropriate, really fun colleagues and an engaging work environment.

THE ROLE

We are looking to recruit a Customer Representative to join our expanding multilingual team based in London.

The role will involve supporting global customers and therapists with their queries. We’re here to provide a brilliant customer service to everyone – so they can happily enjoy their experience with Urban Massage and focus on that! We take responsibility for keeping everything running as smoothly as possible.



RESPONSIBILITIES

Proactively liasing with therapists / customers to ensure bookings run smoothly
Investigate and resolve customer queries
Answering the phone, emails, texts and tweets from Customers / Therapists / Partners
Providing feedback to relevant departments to help improve our customer experience
Making sure both parties love us - that’s your main task!

REQUIREMENTS

Fluency in German, French and English
Be hands-on, a go-getter and quick learner
A calm and friendly telephone manner
A great multi-tacker able to tackle lots of different things at the same time
Able to work weekend and evening shifts, as these are our busiest times!

BENEFITS

Competitive rate
Plenty of opportunities to learn and grow within our business
Join a fast-growing and exciting start-up
Free weekly yoga sessions
Working with a fun and highly-motivated team. Never a dull moment for sure!

jobs.title: Supply Operations Assistant - Acquisition
jobs.description:
Urban Massage are on a mission to democratise access to wellness on a global level. With an on-demand app using cutting edge technology platforms to connect thousands of passionate, high quality practitioners with people in need of a massage, osteopathy and other treatments.

Our Supply Team are an essential part of our business, building and nurturing Urban Massage's partner community. A key step to this is acquiring practitioners that want to work with us, and supporting them through the application process. We are looking for a confident communicator with strong admin skills to support this key function within the supply team.


RESPONSIBILITIES

* Lead generation by identifying potential applicants from directories, incoming applications and other sources
* Cold-calling prospective therapist partners, informing them about the Urban platform and benefits of becoming a therapist partner, booking them for an onboarding session
* Handling incoming enquiries by phone and email
* Reporting on KPIs and target
* Maintaining operations by following policies and procedures; reporting needed changes
* Contributing to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed

Requirements

* Graduate level applicants desirable
* Background in customer services or sales desirable
* Knowledge of wellness industry desirable but not essential
* Ability to self-start and remain motivated
* Able to work as part of a team
* Strong communication skills is a must
* Computer literate with knowledge of Microsoft suite (desirable but not essential: Salesforce)
* Good telephone manner
* Ability to multitask and work across multiple wellness sectors

Benefits

* £18,000 per annum
* Take a key role in our journey to revolutionise wellness globally. Be part of a diverse, talented and driven team, carefully assembled from all over the world
* Take ownership of what you do, and make an impact immediately, with the opportunity to learn every day
* Casual Dress Policy
* Access to benefits through Perkbox
* Access your earned wages before payday through Wagestream
* Urban Unlimited Holiday after probation (yes we mean it)
* Flexible working arrangements
* Annual company retreat/large event
* Discounts on at-home massages
* Free weekly yoga/fitness sessions
* Our amazing Urban HQ in central London with a Ping-Pong Table, Juices and Fresh Fruit, breakfasts and more.

jobs.title: Urban Sales Ambassador
jobs.description:
Urban was founded in 2014 by Jack and Giles who had a simple mission: to provide easy and affordable access to wellness, so people can live happier and healthier every day.

Since then, we've delivered well over 300,000 massage therapy treatments in London, Paris, Manchester and Birmingham. We empower wellness practitioners by providing them with a marketplace to meet local customers, business software to manage their work and a community to belong to.

In late 2018, we expanded beyond massage to form three business divisions: mind/body, beauty and fitness. Our growing range of services includes massage, facial, nail and osteopath treatments performed at times and places chosen by our clients.


The Role


We are looking to work with more technicians in the beauty space. We are looking for young, hungry freelance sales-people with tenacity and a passion for beauty, and who like the idea of receiving free manicures, to work with us!


How’s it work?

* You will be tasked with promoting the Urban brand to nail technicians, who currently work either at salons or mobile.
* To help you with this task, we will pay for your expenses, including free manicures and pedicures.
* You will be rewarded with commission for every successful sale you make (a sale being a new technician joining the platform
* You will receive information to help you with this task, including the selling points of Urban.

Requirements

* We’re looking for really strong communicators, who can build a rapport quickly.
* Must be willing to receive free beauty treatments!!
* This role is for those living, studying or working in zones 1-3 of London, as this is our target area.
* Must be presentable and good ambassadors for our brand.

Benefits

* Free treatments
* Commission for every successful sale
